document_data.name: ''History of the Vast''
document_data.mainbody: '''''History of the Vast''''' was a book detailing the [[the Vast#History|history]] of the realm of [[the Vast]], including the [[orc]] realm of [[Vastar]] and the [[dwarf]] kingdom of [[Roldilar|the Realm of Glimmering Swords]], and the [[human]] settlement that followed.<ref><ref><ref>
